profileAlternative.name: Joe Kutner
profileAlternative.headline: Java Language Owner @ Heroku
profileAlternative.summary: I curate the Java experience on Heroku. Previously, I was a programmer and founder at Logichaus, a software consultancy specializing in Java, Ruby, and iOS development. I've written three books for the Pragmatic Bookshelf, including Deploying With JRuby and The Healthy Programmer.

positions.title: Founder
positions.description: Consulting for Ruby, JRuby, Rails, iOS and Java development.

given.text: Josh is a highly-technical software programmer. His skills are diverse, and this is demonstrated by his ability to build applications of all kinds. He is both proficient and passionate about the craft of software.

Venkata is an excellent leader and implementer. He is able to identify problems and set people in the right direction to solve those problems. His most valuable characteristic is the ability to make steady and effective progress toward a goal.
